instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3737: What is 820-3737? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3737</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> video issue
threads.message:
Board got dedicated GPU and video issue like on attached photo.

A few seconds is OK then lines and freeze, then OK for a few secs and lines/freeze etc
no matter if it works on dedicated or integrated GPU got same issue.

3x FDMF6708N has been replaced and same issue (brand new components from Mouser)

Any idea?

[ATTACH]59301[/ATTACH]

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3737</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> video issue
threads.message: do you try on external display?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3737</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> video issue
threads.message:
I suppose you have 3787 board.
If the same issue persists on boyj iGPU and dedicated GPU, should be LCD problem.
Very easy to discard, checking external video...
